root.message: The RATIONALE field for indicator 2-2-1, translated into en
root.data:
- This indicator assesses the status of malnutrition in children, and monitors the number of children with developmental delays who are at high risk of illness or death due to poor diet and/or recurrent infections.

- As a basis for propaganda and education for parents, mothers and pregnant women to improve the quality of child care and prevent child malnutrition

- Reflecting on economic conditions and assessing maternal and child health care and evaluating the effectiveness of malnutrition prevention programs
